title: Clinton, Purser & Arnold, to their countreymen wheresoeuer Wherein is described by their own hands their vnfeigned penitence for their offences past: their patience in welcoming their death, & their duetiful minds towardes her most excellent Maiestie.
author: Clinton, Atkinson.
publisher: Imprinted by Iohn Wolfe and are to be sold [by W. Wright] at the middle shop in the Poultry, ioyning S. Mildreds Church,
notes: The first poem is signed: Thomas Walton alias Purser.
Clinton's full name and bookseller's name from, and publication date conjectured by, STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
